SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The ID of the target subscription.

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for this operation.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive.

provider.description: Localized friendly form of the resource provider name.

resource.description: Localized friendly form of the resource type related to this action/operation.

operation.description: Localized friendly name for the operation, as it should be shown to the user.

description.description: Localized friendly description for the operation, as it should be shown to the user.

ElasticSanRPOperation.description: Description of a ElasticSan RP Operation

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation applies to data-plane.

ElasticSanOperationListResult.description: List of operations supported by the RP.

value.description: An array of operations supported by the ElasticSan RP.

nextLink.description: URI to fetch the next section of the paginated response.

value.description: An array of Elastic San objects.

nextLink.description: URI to fetch the next section of the paginated response.

systemData.description: Resource metadata required by ARM RPC

availabilityZones.description: Logical zone for Elastic San resource; example: ["1"].

provisioningState.description: State of the operation on the resource.

baseSizeTiB.description: Base size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

extendedCapacitySizeTiB.description: Extended size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

totalVolumeSizeGiB.description: Total size of the provisioned Volumes in GiB.

volumeGroupCount.description: Total number of volume groups in this Elastic San appliance.

totalIops.description: Total Provisioned IOPS of the Elastic San appliance.

totalMBps.description: Total Provisioned MBps Elastic San appliance.

totalSizeTiB.description: Total size of the Elastic San appliance in TB.

baseSizeTiB.description: Base size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

extendedCapacitySizeTiB.description: Extended size of the Elastic San appliance in TiB.

locations.description: The set of locations that the SKU is available. This will be supported and registered Azure Geo Regions (e.g. West US, East US, Southeast Asia, etc.).

locationInfo.description: Availability of the SKU for the location/zone

capabilities.description: The capability information in the specified SKU.

value.description: A string value to indicate states of given capability.

SKUCapability.description: The capability information in the specified SKU.

Sku.description: The SKU name. Required for account creation; optional for update.

targetIqn.description: iSCSI Target IQN (iSCSI Qualified Name); example: "iqn.2005-03.org.iscsi:server".

provisioningState.description: State of the operation on the resource.

status.description: Operational status of the iSCSI Target.

systemData.description: Resource metadata required by ARM RPC

value.description: An array of Volume Groups objects.

nextLink.description: URI to fetch the next section of the paginated response.

provisioningState.description: State of the operation on the resource.

networkAcls.description: A collection of rules governing the accessibility from specific network locations.
A collection of rules governing the accessibility from specific network locations.

systemData.description: Resource metadata required by ARM RPC

nextLink.description: URI to fetch the next section of the paginated response.

volumeId.description: Unique Id of the volume in GUID format

creationData.description: State of the operation on the resource.

SourceCreationData.description: Data source used when creating the volume.

createSource.description: This enumerates the possible sources of a volume creation.

sourceUri.description: If createOption is Copy, this is the ARM id of the source snapshot or disk. If createOption is Restore, this is the ARM-like id of the source disk restore point.

ProvisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the iSCSI Target.

EncryptionType.description: The type of key used to encrypt the data of the disk.

values.description: Volume is encrypted at rest with Platform managed key. It is the default encryption type.

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives.

ErrorAdditionalInfo.description: The resource management error additional info.

virtualNetworkRules.description: The list of virtual network rules.

NetworkRuleSet.description: A set of rules governing the network accessibility.

id.description: Resource ID of a subnet, for example: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{groupName}/providers/Microsoft.Network/virtualNetworks/{vnetName}/subnets/{subnetName}.

action.description: The action of virtual network rule.

state.description: Gets the state of virtual network rule.
